questionnaire.question: Given a string, find if it has all unique characters
questionnaire.description: You have to find out in a given string whether all characters are unique
hints: You can use minimal preliminary variables but no complex data structure

questionnaire.question: Given an integer array A, create a new output array B such that each entry B[i]= product of all elements of A except  A[i].
questionnaire.description: O(n) time complexity and w/o using any extra space apart from the output array B. Division operation should not be used as well.

questionnaire.question: Given a Source string S[n] and a pattern P[m], find ALL occurances of P in S.
questionnaire.description: O(mn) time complexity is easily achievable, try improving it.
